#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
#include <cmath>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cstring>

using namespace std;

#define mod 10000007
long long int arr[11000][10][7];

long long cricinfo(long long int Runs,int Wickets,int Balls){
	if(Runs <= 0)
		return 1;
	if(Wickets <= 0)
		return 1;
	if(Balls <= 0)
		return 1;
	if(arr[Runs][Wickets][Balls] != -1){
		return arr[Runs][Wickets][Balls];
	}
	long long tot = 1;
	tot+=cricinfo(Runs,Wickets,Balls-1);
	tot+=cricinfo(Runs-1,Wickets,Balls-1);
	tot+=cricinfo(Runs-2,Wickets,Balls-1);
	tot+=cricinfo(Runs-3,Wickets,Balls-1);
	tot+=cricinfo(Runs-4,Wickets,Balls-1);
	tot+=cricinfo(Runs-6,Wickets,Balls-1);
	tot+=cricinfo(Runs-1,Wickets,Balls);
	tot+=cricinfo(Runs-2,Wickets,Balls);
	tot+=cricinfo(Runs-3,Wickets,Balls);
	tot+=cricinfo(Runs-5,Wickets,Balls);
	tot+=cricinfo(Runs-1,Wickets,Balls);
	tot+=cricinfo(Runs-2,Wickets,Balls);
	tot+=cricinfo(Runs-5,Wickets,Balls);
	tot+=cricinfo(Runs-7,Wickets,Balls);
	tot+=cricinfo(Runs,Wickets-1,Balls-1);
	tot = tot%mod;
	arr[Runs][Wickets][Balls] = tot;
	return tot;
}

int main(){
	memset(arr,-1,sizeof arr);
	long long int test;
	cin>>test;
	for(long long int i = 1;i <= test;i++){
		long long int N;
		cin>>N;
		cout<<"Case "<<i<<": "<<cricinfo(N,6,6)<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
